name: Ical-event-creator-app
tagline: Repository for the iCal Event Creator App
body:
### Welcome to iCal-Event-Creator-App

![img](https://raw.github.com/justinslee/iCal-Event-Creator-App/master/images/iCalEventGUI.png?raw=true)

# Project Information: 

The project aims to allow for a GUI interface that can create .ics files with various specifications that most iCal calendars are unable to do including multi-day events and GPS location.  It also contains various error checking mechanisms to prevent invalid .ics files and some XSS scripting prevention.  

#Project Details

### Documentation: 

* [Home](http://justinslee.github.com/iCal-Event-Creator-App/)
* [User Guide](https://github.com/justinslee/iCal-Event-Creator-App/wiki/User-Guide)
* [Developer Guide](https://github.com/justinslee/iCal-Event-Creator-App/wiki/Developer-Guide)

### Project Community:

* [Requests Page] (https://github.com/justinslee/iCal-Event-Creator-App/wiki/Requests)
* [Contact Us](https://github.com/justinslee/iCal-Event-Creator-App/wiki/Contact-Us)

# Future Developments
Eventually this project will be available as an executable jar file and can be built using maven.
